thread.title: Mary Jo Fisher
thread.title_full: FMW Fasteners reviewed by Mary Jo Fisher

author: Mary Jo Fisher
title: Mary Jo Fisher
text: Exactly the size & type of nuts & bolts we were looking for, at an affordable cost. Ordering was easy, payment was verified immediately by email, then tracking of the order was sent automatically to our email. Also shipping was free for orders over 25 - important when ordering something as heavy as nuts & bolts - & we received the order in less then a week!!! I would recommend FMW Fasteners to everyone.
